ra, ESTIMATED ANNUAL GOST IF SERVICE PROVIDED BY COMMON CARRIER
Existing tariffs for microwave relay service provided by ccanon carrier
facilities (Telephone Co.) would result in an annual charge in excess of the
estimated capital outlay for the proposed relay System and many times the esti¬
mated annual operating cost of the state's own facilities. Rates are based on
circuit mileage, connection services, circuit reversals, and other factors.
